resources.string:
Hello and welcome to Chaos Jungle! 

In here you will brave bandits and many more dangerous obstacles in search of valuable treasure. 

How much can you find before the jungle takes your life?
You visited the Inn and feel refreshed and stronger! \n(One day has passed)
After wandering around through the jungle underbrush for a time, you find yourself wondering where to go next.
The treasure is so close you can feel it in your bones! Just have to push past this overgrowth.
Oh no! A snake jumped out and bit you before running away. \n\n(You\'ve lost 2 health)
You find a wise Shaman who restores your powers.\n\n(+1 to all Specials)
You walk into a huge spider web. Large spiders fall all over you and you injure yourself in the mayhem. \n\n(You\'ve lost 2 health)
Coming across a beautiful oasis, you rest a moment and restore your health. \n\n(Health Restored)
Finding an abandoned tent in the jungle, you quickly search the area. \n\n(You find a random special!)
You stumble and find the bones of a dead body. Something seems oddly familiar about the traveler... \n\n(You find a random special!)
A group of bandits bursts forth from the underbrush. \n\nPrepare to defend yourself!
Hearing a loud growl, you look up to see a leopard in the trees. \n\nIt is attacking!
Despite your best effort you have died to the perils of Chaos Jungle! \n\nWant to try your luck again?
Congratulations!! You have found the famed treasure! \n\n There are more to get, can you find them all?
